content: > this pattern is available for free on my blog 1 the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern including all photo tutorials + a bonus garment schematic + crochet stitch chart in one printable file without advertisements the suvi crochet tank top features a lightweight and breezy design perfect for warm weather made with silky-smooth lion brand truboo yarn and lacy crochet stitches this tank top is beautiful when worn on its own or layered over a lightweight cami for a fun summery vibe pair it with shorts skirts or even jeans purchase the kit here aff 2 lion brand also has a full kit of the suvi crochet tank top available on their website the kit includes your choice of color and a digital copy of the pattern **size inclusive** women s sizes x-small small medium large x-large 2x-large 3x-large 4x-large 5x-large to fit chest 28-30 32-34 36-38 40-42 44-46 48-50 52-54 56-58 60 - 62 *this tank top is designed to be worn with approximately 2″ 4″ of negative ease choose a size that is 2″ 4″ smaller than your actual bust size * instructions included for adjusting tank top length **yarn** the sample in the photos was crocheted with lion brand yarns truboo dk weight / 3 yarn 100% rayon from bamboo 241 yards / 220 m / 100 g / 3 5 oz other dk weight 3 yarns can be substituted as long as gauge is met **pattern notes** the pattern is a written pattern and also includes a garment schematic stitch chart and progression photos crochet tank top design is an a crocheted simplicity original design join the a crocheted simplicity crochet community group on facebook to stay up to date with new releases giveaways sales and testing opportunities https //www facebook com/groups/906744872727855/ you can also find me on etsy a crocheted simplicity jennifer renaud all of my patterns are written in standard american terms unless noted otherwise please note that due to the nature of digital files i cannot take any refunds however i do offer customer support and will try my best to help you with the instructions © 2025 designed by jennifer renaud aka a crocheted simplicity all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are property of a crocheted simplicity the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and charity sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to a crocheted simplicity is greatly appreciated no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from jennifer renaud 1 https //www acrochetedsimplicity com/crochet-tank-top-pattern/ 2 https //lionbrand sjv io/xm5zvy
